definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Dian4 li4 Jian1 guan3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Operation of a power system disconnected from neighboring power systems.
sentences.chinese: 一个电力系统与相邻系统解列后的一种运行。

sentences.english: Forecasting the market-clearing price (MCP) is the most essential task for any decision-making in electricity market.
sentences.chinese: 市场清算电价预测是电力市场中交易决策的基础。

sentences.english: Food and water ran short, power blacked out.
sentences.chinese: 食物和水越来越少，电力也被切断了。

sentences.english: Right now, Hockaday's prototypes put out only a few milli- watts of power.
sentences.chinese: 现在，霍克蒂的燃料电池原型只能输出几毫瓦的电力。

sentences.english: It was unveiled by Tokyo Electric Power Chairman Tsuneihisa Katsumata.
sentences.chinese: 东京电力公司总裁清水正孝宣布了这一计划。

sentences.english: The electric power system of Jiangsu oilfield has its own network and characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 江苏油田的电力系统自成网络并独具特点。

sentences.english: He was responsible for our first system of communication based on electricity.
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的第一台电力通信系统的创造者。

sentences.english: And this is a powerplant to supply all those other plants with electricity.
sentences.chinese: 这个电厂向其他所有工厂提供电力。

sentences.english: In large interconnected power system, there have been spontaneous system oscillations at very low frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 在大型电力系统中存在有自生的甚低频系统振荡。

sentences.english: Generally power cables laid in a special cable tunnel or in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 电力电缆一般是敷设于专门的电缆隧道和土壤中。

sentences.english: Power will be provided by a single turbofan engine.
sentences.chinese: 电力将提供一个单一的涡扇发动机。

sentences.english: Lightning disturbance threats the security of weak current equipments in power system seriously.
sentences.chinese: 雷击严重威胁着电力系统中弱电设备的安全运行。

sentences.english: Industrial exports include gold, mercury, uranium, and natural gas and electricity.
sentences.chinese: 工业出口包括黄金，汞，铀，天然气和电力。

sentences.english: Put in the power cable to the power supply unit.
sentences.chinese: 在电力电缆的电源供应器。

sentences.english: Tepco and the safety agency say the exact source of the leak is unknown.
sentences.chinese: 东京电力和安全机构人士说，泄漏的确切来源不明。

sentences.english: Pushing water past the core means pumps that are generally run by electricity.
sentences.chinese: 把水推过核心意味着需要由电力驱动的水泵。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
